Description of incident: The owner of a Chines restaurant called the Ginger Blossom discovered that one of her employees stealing customer credit and debit card information. The employee was caught on surveillance video with a skimming device. The police recovered a bag that was hidden in a planter outside of the restaurant that contained the scanner and numerous pre-pad gift cards and credit cards. More information: http://wwlp.com/2015/09/25/waiter-charged-with-credit-card-fraud/
